title: Connected Learning-Based Technology Integration Education Design Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and understanding of language education theory
context.additional_context: Project-based learning emphasizing peer collaboration and real-life integration in a digitally supported environment.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can propose technology-integrated lesson designs suitable for language classes by applying a connected learning framework.
Learners can develop and implement learner-engaged language education projects using digital storytelling tools.
Effective implementation strategies for technology-enhanced lessons can be improved through a peer feedback system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
